poem:
### Hidden Ink

Beneath the blue, a shadowed script,  
In files unseen, truths tightly gripped,  
Where voices whisper through the seams  
Of policies and shelved-off dreams.  
A buried line in quiet halls,  
Bias echoes in the walls;  
Ink of silence stains the page,  
A story told in hidden rage.
